(function() {
    var ab = function() {
        var inputSeller = $('input[name=sellerId]:first');

        if(!!inputSeller.length &amp;&amp; inputSeller.attr('value') !== "0") {

            $('.product-img.active img').css('opacity', '0');

            console.log('Seller, change image!');

            var loopInterval = setInterval(function() {
                $('.product-img.active img').attr('src', $('.product-img.active img').attr('src').replace('zoom', 'detalhe'));
                $('.product-img.active img').attr('data-zoom-image', $('.product-img.active img').attr('src').replace('zoom', 'detalhe'));
                clearInterval(loopInterval);
                $('.product-img.active img').css('opacity', '1');
            }, 500);

            var loopInterval3 = setInterval(function() {
                if($(".zoomContainer").length === 1) {
                    $('.zoomLens img').attr('src', $('.zoomLens img').attr('src').replace('zoom', 'detalhe'));
                    clearInterval(loopInterval3);

                }
            }, 1000);
        }
    };

    var loopInterval4 = setInterval(function() {

        if (typeof jQuery === 'function') {

            clearInterval(loopInterval4);

            $(document).ajaxStop(function() {
                ab();
            });

            $('.photo-gallery-list li img').on('click', function() { ab(); });
            $('.photo-gallery-list li img').mouseenter(function() { ab(); });
        }
    }, 500);
